item.description:
I'm helping out the Organizer of another Meetup who was looking for a venue to host this event, so thought I'd pass the word on about it:
The full details are at: Girls Night Out Salon Event
http://couples.meetup...
There are opportunities for group discounts, so if you want to attend:
(1) Please RSVP a YES ASAP, and
(2) Pay for your event ticket via PayPal.

I will arrange a group discount (20% off the usual event fee) for all paid-up YES RSVP's from our group and then purchase tickets for us from the Event Organizer's web-site.

Please note that once purchased, your ticket to this event is not refundable - but you can substitute some one else to take your place if you cannot make it.

I will send out directions and information re: parking and event hostess contact phone numbers to all YES RSVP's the week of the event.

Any questions, please E-mail Robyn
item.how_to_find_us: Blonde with the foreign accent, pouring the wine!
item.name: Girls Night Out - Sx Ed Salon for Women Only
